movie.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
movie.actors: Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Alan Rickman, Daniel Radcliffe
movie.plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 45 wins & 91 nominations.
